actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The mage makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) Force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The mage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At Will: Detect Magic, Light, Mage Armor (included in AC), Mage Hand, Prestidigitation
2/Day Each: Fireball (level 4 version), Invisibility
1/Day Each: Cone of Cold, Fly

bonus_actions.name: Misty Step
bonus_actions.description: The mage casts Misty Step, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
